name: Odeko
headline: Our operations software makes it easier to run--and grow--your cafe
description: We’re a passionate team of dreamers and builders, determined to liberate small businesses from the not-so-fun aspects of the job so that they can focus on what’s fun and important.
generated_description:
**Odeko: Revolutionizing Café Operations**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator’s Summer 2019 batch, Odeko is a New York-based company dedicated to simplifying and enhancing the café experience for small business owners. With a growing team of 371 passionate individuals, Odeko's mission is crystal clear: to help cafes thrive by taking the burden off their operational tasks, allowing owners to focus on what they love most.

At its core, Odeko develops sophisticated operations software that ensures your café is always stocked with the essentials. Their platform provides predictive ordering, overnight delivery, and smart inventory management. This means less time worrying about supplies and more time engaging with customers. Imagine reducing your ordering time by up to 10 hours a week or cutting food waste by 50%—that’s the kind of magic Odeko claims to deliver.

Tagged under the categories of B2B, logistics, and headquartered in New York, Odeko doesn’t just stop at supply chain management. They also offer mobile order management and a rewards program through a beautifully designed all-in-one app—keeping the complexities of café operations streamlined.

Dane Atkinson, CEO of Odeko, often speaks about their journey and the impressive turnaround from zero revenue to an impressive $150 million. The company has received recognition, including a place on Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500 list, validating their innovation in the tech-driven food service sector.

In a nutshell, if you’re a café owner looking to save time, reduce costs, and reduce carbon emissions, Odeko might just be the partner you need. After all, they promise to fill your cup without cluttering your inbox.

For more details and to see how Odeko works its own kind of magic, visit their website: [Odeko](http://www.odeko.com).
